channel.title: Need a tiny bit of help
channel.description:
how do i change the commands so example(::phats ) gives ppl party hat set
how do i change wat npc say in the banks
how do i change wat npc sells and there prices
please help me
and how do i fix npc's so they can die

item.title: Need a tiny bit of help
item.dc:creator: @white_phat white phat
item.description:
@white_phat wrote:

awsome thank you very much for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Need a tiny bit of help
item.dc:creator: @t4_medicwade t4 medicwade
item.description:
@t4_medicwade wrote:

To change the commands search the command (For example ::starter) and under that you’ll see addItem(xxx,xxx) change the first number to the item code and the second to the amount.

To change what the npc in the bank says go to i think its Npc.Handler and search for what the npc says, then just change it.

To change what the npc sells go to shops and it will have all the items and amount of the item for each shop and just edit that.

I don’t know how to make it so npc’s die, sorry about that.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a tiny bit of help
